I live in the neighborhood and passed by this place many times, it always looks inviting and happening. Today I finally gave it a try and came for brunch. Excellent experience and it starts with the way we were greeted. This is a relatively small and very popular place so you can imagine the crowd especially for Sunday brunch. The hostess is polite and attentive. She promises to sit us in 5-7 min and that's exactly what happens. (we got lucky, large group just left) I have to emphasize absolutely exceptional service from everyone working there. Mind you it's madhouse inside yet waiters manage to get everything right, quick and with a smile. Food is good of course, just as everyone says :)
